discussion.content: "compliance testing completed" surely means that the test have been finished. If this is the case, then the answer would be general availability?

I found this article.
- With compliance testing, there are two important concepts to consider: compliance testing and compliance checks.
- Compliance testing ensures that the output of each development lifecycle phase conforms to agreed-upon requirements.
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/developer/terraform/best-practices-compliance-testing
Public, Private, Private(or all options are correct), GA

private->public->general->end-of-life (lifecycle)
private & public differ in scope. Public has more users. These 2 stages are so that MicroSoft can gain feedback. The feedback received are test results. Private & Public are testing stages & the users are the guinea pigs. When testing is complete, product is released for general availability stage.

comments.content:
1-Private, 2-Public, 3-GA, 4-GA
Private Preview:
Limited access only for trusted testers or partners.
Not announced to a wide audience.
Public Preview:
Available to a limited number of external customers who, for example, applied for testing.
Already announced, but it may have bugs or limitations.
General Availability (GA) covers two levels: after testing is completed (Compliance testing completed) and when it becomes available for purchase (Available for purchase).

questions.question_text:
Your company is planning to migrate to Microsoft Azure and Microsoft 365.
You are required to identify a cloud service that allows for the deployment of a Linux virtual machine.
Which of the following is the model you should choose?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
VM is an inftastructure

Selected Answer: C
The two choices that work are platform as a service and infrastructure as a service. I would say infrastructure as a service is correct because I don't believe platform as a service allows you to run VMS inside of your initial virtual machine, AKA nested virtual machines. Infrastructure as a service allows you to run your desired operating system on bare metal which would certainly let us run the Linux VM in question.

Selected Answer: C
Iaas, included the servers, networking and storage so answer c

Selected Answer: C
IAAS infrastructure as as service
IAAS ( infrastructure as as service

Selected Answer: C
C for sure

Para implantar uma máquina virtual Linux no Microsoft Azure, você deve escolher o modelo de Infraestrutura como Serviço (IaaS). O IaaS fornece a flexibilidade de implantar e gerenciar máquinas virtuais em um ambiente de nuvem, incluindo máquinas virtuais Linux, e permite que você tenha controle sobre o sistema operacional, aplicativos e configurações da máquina virtual.

Portanto, a opção correta é:

C. Infraestrutura como serviço (IaaS)

Selected Answer: C
C. Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) because VM part of Infrastrure

Microsoft SharePoint online

The tool that should be used to co-author files with other users in Microsoft Office 365 subscription is A. Microsoft SharePoint Online.

SharePoint Online is a cloud-based platform that enables users to store, organize, and collaborate on files and documents. Co-authoring is a key feature of SharePoint Online, allowing multiple users to work on the same document simultaneously.

Skype for Business Online is a communication tool for instant messaging, voice, and video calls, but it doesn't support co-authoring files.

Office Delve is an intelligent search and discovery tool that helps users find and organize content across Office 365, but it doesn't support co-authoring files.

Exchange Online is an email and calendar platform, but it doesn't support co-authoring files.

Selected Answer: A
For sure A
Correct
This is A for sure
correct

Correct answer

Keep in mind that deactivation does not uninstall Office. Office that has been deactivated will be in reduced functionality mode (which means you can just read and print existing documents).

questions.answer_description:
When you deactivate a Microsoft Office 365 ProPlus license, Office 365 ProPlus remains installed on the computer, but you can only view and print documents. All features for editing or creating new documents are disabled.
Note:
There are several versions of this question in the exam. The question has two possible correct answers:
1. View a document
2. Print a document
Other incorrect answer options you may see on the exam include the following:
1. Leave a comment in a document.
2. Start a new document from a template.
3. Set properties on a document.
4. Create a document
5. Edit a document
6. Co-author a document
7. Edit a column
Reference:
https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/office_resource_kit/2014/01/17/office-365-proplus-multiple-devices-and-deactivation/
